body: Listed French artist Louis-Robert de Cuvillon’s watercolors are very subtle and delicate.  Many of his passionate works such as “Woman with a Tambourine”, “Woman in Exotic Dress”, and “Girl with a Fan” have been sold through such venues as Sotheby’s New York and Bonhams Los Angeles.  This watercolor titled “Reclining Woman with Bouquet” is framed in a period Art Nouveau silver scrolled frame.
dimensions: Watercolor and gouache, 5.5 x 8 inches fan-shaped / Signed lower right
metaTitle: Louis-Robert de Cuvillon Painting - Reclining Woman with Bouquet - 19th Century French Fine Art
